original_title: Alors Que Nous Dansons Avec La Mort
overview: Death and a heartbreak, both of them mean the end of something. Both of them are changes. And in order to live, these changes are needed.  Both the end of a relationship and death mean the end of a life. The director takes a trip through Super 8 footage in which she reflects on life, death and love
title: Alors Que Nous Dansons Avec La Mort
